summary: In Shanghai, dragon-lady 'Mother' Gin Sling operates a gambling house for wealthy patrons but she clashes with influential land developer Sir Guy Charteris who wants to put her out-of-business.
cast: Gene Tierney|Walter Huston|Victor Mature|Ona Munson|Phyllis Brooks|Albert Bassermann|Maria Ouspenskaya|Eric Blore|Ivan Lebedeff|Mike Mazurki|Clyde Fillmore|Grayce Hampton|Rex Evans|Mikhail Rasumny|Michael Dalmatoff|Marcel Dalio|John Abbott|Enrique Acosta|Mimi Aguglia|Brooks Benedict|Paul Bradley|Jean De Briac|Jack Deery|Steven Geray|Sam Harris|Leyland Hodgson|Roland Lui|Allen Marlow|Eric Mayne|Moy Ming|Edmund Mortimer|Manuel París|Albert Pollet|Emil Rameau|Count Stefenelli
title: El embrujo de Shanghái
